question: Is there a dua that will help me to cope better with the pressures I face in life and make me a mentally stronger person? I will soon start my exams for the final year of university.
answer:
QUESTION
I am a Muslim female and will soon start my exams for the final year of university. For a few months now I have been feeling very frustrated and depressed. I am very worried about not doing well, and not being able to cope with the pressure. I get upset very quickly over little things because of the pressure I feel. Sometimes I feel like I will lose my mind. I often sit for hours just crying because I feel so helpless. I do not have any motivation, I feel like giving up on my work-because I don't think I can cope with it all.
ANSWER

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
